headline: Is DexCom (DXCM) Pricing Justified After Recent Multi Year Share Price Weakness
summary: Wondering whether DexCom's current share price lines up with its underlying worth, or if the market is missing something important about this glucose monitoring specialist? DexCom shares last closed at US$70.25, with returns of 0.5% over 7 days, 4.9% over 30 days, 5.6% year to date, but an 11.3% decline over 1 year, a 35.9% decline over 3 years and a 21.4% decline over 5 years, which can change how investors think about both risk and opportunity. Recent coverage of DexCom has focused on its...
